known_issues: Multi-language support broken — only Hindi is working, other languages are not functioning

existing_features.title: Fix the language switching functionality so that all 7 supported Indian languages (Hindi, English, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Bengali, Marathi, or whichever are defined in translations.ts) work correctly when selected via the LanguageSelector component. Currently only Hindi renders translated content; all other languages fall back to incorrect or missing strings.

new_feature_requests.summary: Audit translations.ts to ensure every language's translation object is complete — all keys defined in the Translation interface must have non-empty string values for every supported language. Fill in any missing or placeholder entries.
